author: Rebecca Buechel

comments.message: ALSO, SOLAR TOILET STERILIZES WASTE WATER   http://www.wired.com/2013/11/design-for-the-developing-world/#slideid-295721

Dear Ms. Buechel,You're right, sanitation is a key element to reducing/eliminating disease,, but really, adding a product like this to rural areas are not likely anytime soon. Folks there have a different 'standard' of sanitation overall, and unless education changes the mind, nothing else can.Even though you are completely correct in addressing basic sanitation issues, the reality is offering this type of product stands about as much chance of being widely employed, as I do of winning ANY round of "Dancing With the Stars" :(

Dear Nfn They,Thanks for looking at the idea. Do you think such a product might be a starting point for education in safer sanitation in rural zones ?What starting points do you envisage for tackling the spread of contamination through lack of sanitation ?

description: this exists, let's use it
